title: ATLanyards Blue, Green, and Purple Paracord Clip Eyeglass Holder, CHOOSE YOUR SIZE Glasses Cord, 332
features: To browse more clip eyeglass holders please type ‘ATLanyards clip eyeglass’ into the Amazon search bar. You can also click the blue ‘ATLanyards’ link above the product photo.
Hand assembled in the USA. Made of 2mm paracord (#95 parachute cording). Paracord is strong, durable, and long lasting. Paracord will not fray like similar cords.
Non slip glasses clips make for a secure, tight hold to your glasses and will not leave marks on your glasses. Works great with any size ear wires, thin or thick!
SELECT YOUR SIZE! Small- 26” Medium- 28.5” Large- 32” (Based on total length of product.)
Type ‘ATLanyards’ into Amazon’s search bar to view additional products handmade by us in the USA. Refine your search to ‘prime only’ to ensure you are getting official ATLanyards products.
description: This paracord clip eyeglass holder is a great solution to keeping track of your glasses. Whether you have regular glasses, reading glasses, sunglasses, or bifocals this clip eyeglass holder will help keep them safe and close at hand when you need them. The cord is made of 2mm #95 paracord. Paracord is another name for parachute cording and is used in things such as outdoor climbing activities. You can be confident paracord is a long lasting, very durable material that will not fray like similar eyeglass cords. Despite its durability it will hang softly while in use. The findings and jump rings used on this eyeglass holder are made of stainless steel and will not lose their shiny silver luster over time. The eyeglass clips included on this eyeglass holder are an amazing solution to keeping your glasses secure! The clips have a soft clear layer of plastic on the inside which helps to hold tight to your glasses of any size and also assures that clips will not leave a mark on your glasses frames. The clips measure 3/4" long, bottom of the clip is 1/4" wide and the top is 3/8" wide and are made of silver plated steel. (Please note the dime in the last product photo is shown for cord size comparison purposes only and is not included in the purchase of this item.) SELECT YOUR SIZE: Small- Paracord strand measures 24”; total length including eyeglass clips measures 26” Medium- Paracord strand measures 26.5”; total length including eyeglass clips measures 28.5” Large- Paracord strand measures 30”; total length including eyeglass clips measures 32” If you like the eyeglass clips this eyeglass holder has to offer please search our inventory for more options. You can do this by typing ‘ATLanyards clip eyeglass’ into the Amazon search bar. To view all the items we hand make please click the blue ‘ATLanyards’ link above the product photo or by typing ‘ATLanyards’ into the Amazon search bar.
